On 6/22/10 2:20 AM, Bernd wrote:
> Dear list,
>
> are the operation hours of the heritrix maven repository restricted?

No, the goal for that server is 24/7/365 operation, without even so much 
as a lunch break.

However, the server process was mistakenly left unstarted after a 
restart cycle of all the components of our automatic builds. It should 
be reachable again, as of a few hours ago.

> Tried to access
> http://builds.archive.org:8080/maven2/org/archive/heritrix/heritrix/
> for quiete some time now but no success.
>
> Is there a mirror available?

No mirror is set up.

In theory everything available from that repository should be 
reconstructable from our project SVN and/or the global maven2 
repository. If you know any aspect for which that's not the case, let us 
know.

- Gordon @ IA
